bio:
Service-focused Full stack Blockchain and web Developer, back-end components (API/REST/caching), front-end development (http ,cookies, headers) and JavaScript 

  Working on DApp, TRUFFLE, NFTs, Smart contracts, Solidity, etc and development various websites related to Cryptocurrency based on blockchain

 Extensive knowledge of front end development with years of success in blending the art of design with skill of programming to deliver an engaging user experience through efficient website development, proactive feature optimization, and relentless debugging 

 Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies and vast experience in designing interactive applications with test-driven development. 

 Specialize in building all aspects of the user experience and user interface for client-facing landing pages using JavaScript, HTML5,and CSS, and build e-commerce sites using jQuery andReact.js. 

 Experience in all phases of software development life cycle SDLC, including User Interaction, Business Analysis/Modeling, Design/Architecture, Development, Implementation, Integration, Documentation, Testing, and Deployment.

 Proven expertise inusingtheNode.js,Require.js and MVC Frameworks in the development of the web application, and implementing the MVC architecture in backend applications using Node.js and Express.js 

 Proficient in lunching SPA, SSR and PWAs using Vue JS with Quasar, developing Vue web applications with Vue-Cli and Vite, and creating interactive UI with React.js using One-way data flow, Virtual DOM, JSX, React Native concepts. 

 Strong background in resolving complex issues related to browser and network performance, cross-browser and legacy IE compatibility, client-side scaling, data modeling, usability and test ability. 

 Ability to lead cross-functional team to realize the vision, taking into account business and technical requirements, constraints such as time, cost, and architecture tradeoffs.

Full time , 
over 40 hours per week.

abstrac: A 360 IDEA | 360 Interactive Digital Experiential Agency
bio: OffRoad Studios is a renowned digital agency known for its innovative 360 IDEA philosophy, which seamlessly combines technology, creativity, and media. As a global agency, we excel in navigating the digital landscape and provide top-notch brand strategy, digital design, and technology services to Fortune 500 companies and well-known brands. We drive change by helping clients tap into untapped digital opportunities. Our full-service capabilities include brand strategy, experience design, creative content development, connected technologies, digital product development, and more, serving industries such as technology, marketing, automotive, sports, fashion, film & television, and finance. We have been recognized as an influential player in the digital space by industry leaders and have served clients such as Audi, PepsiCo, Cheetos, BBDO, Coca-Cola, Standard Chartered, Cisco, Chevron, and more.

"Unlock the Secret to Hassle-Free Projects with Our Revolutionary Working Methodology!

At our company, we prioritize transparency and communication with our clients. Our standard terms and conditions are designed to ensure that you receive nothing but the best service possible.

Step 1: Award us the project - Our team of specialists is ready to take on your project with unparalleled creativity and attention to detail.

Step 2: Fund 50% amount - We believe in fair payment practices and require only 50% upfront to get started.

Step 3: Release 50% of the amount - We keep you updated every step of the way, so you know exactly what's happening with your project.

Step 4: Provide your email Id - Our project portal allows for direct communication with our creative team, ensuring that your message and expectations are heard loud and clear.

Step 5: Final 50% payment before the delivery of Source files - We don't compromise on quality, and neither should you. Our team will work tirelessly to deliver sophisticated design solutions that meet your unique needs.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Let our innovative use of technology and in-depth knowledge blow your mind and take your projects to the next level. Join our community of satisfied clients today!"

I provide high-quality software development and consulting to independent software vendors, startups and companies.

Bottom line is — I will charge, after much consideration, what I feel would be a very fair price for both the client and myself.
My strong technical knowledge has always been a tremendous asset as it increases my communication and organizational skills. I have used these skills to foster strong relationships with my customers allowing them to feel confident in my recommendations of new products and services driving additional revenue to my organization. bio:
I've worked as a software developer for since late 2012.

I worked with Java for six months when I was employed.

Since going freelance, I have worked in PHP, Python, Clojure and have dabbled in Scheme (specifically Guile and Racket).

I do have some front-end experience, and can do HTML, and basic CSS and Javascript.

I enjoy building software, and the challenge of identifying a solution to a problem I experience with code. I love when my code is operational, and is being used to solve real-world problems; that gives me joy.

I am a self-taught software developer, with an Instrumentation and Control Engineering background.

You can have a look at my [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/fredmanglis) and [GitHub](https://github.com/fredmanglis) to see a number of the open projects I have worked on in the past.

You can also have a look at my site, https://fredmanglis.me.ke to see a selection of articles I have written

Hours of operation: Between 07:00 and 18:00 (+03:00 UTC)
Payment terms: 50 USD per hour

bio:
Activecraft is a STPI (Ministry of Communications and Information Technology Government of India) Registered company. We have a team of 36 professionals.

Activecraft specializes in creating interactive Web Sites, Mobile Apps.
 
We are able to create custom solutions to anything from a simple submission form to complex database solutions. We offer affordable services to Small Medium sized Enterprises and Organizations to advance their competitive standing in the Global Internet E-Commerce and traditional marketplace. 

Our client-friendly process and the process of our team ensures that our clients have to invest minimum time and efforts, yet gain maximum results and benefits.

We understand how to apply innovation to drive measurable business results.
Good customer service is key for us, and no project is completed until you are satisfied.

Our Skill set includes

iOS, Android (React-Native, Flutter, Swift, Objective-c, Java, Kotlin)
Laravel, Ruby on  Rails, PHP (LAMP), PHP framework using Codigniter, cake PHP.
ReactJS, AngularJS, Angular, Python, Golang. 
Wordpress, Woo-commerce, Magento. 
API (SOAP/REST), API Gateway Integrations, AJAX, XML.
CRM Services with Zoho, vtiger, sugar CRM, Zurmo, and Sage CRM.
MySQL, MSSQL
SEO/SMO.
XHTML, HTML5, Bootstrap, Responsive Design, UI/UX and Photoshop.

Why us? 
High-quality work 
Unlimited revisions 
Complete solution 
Reasonable cost and timeline
Payments will be as per guru terms or we can discuss before start.

bio:
360 Digital Pros is a Florida based full-service digital agency with hands-on experience in providing remarkable creative solutions, including logo design, web design and development, animation, digital marketing, and content writing.

The three core values of our agency (client-focused approach, consistency, and highly responsive customer support), differentiate us from others and play an integral role in satisfying customers with all their requirements fully met. When finalizing any project, we make sure to understand the preferences given by the clients, proceed with a consistent flow, and keep in touch with them all the time for any changes and improvements.


Our Process:

1. Presales and Sales
Requirement Gathering, Feasability Analysis, Competitor Analysis, Proposal Submission, Project Kick off.

2. Project Planning
Project Scope Analysis, SRS, FRS, Project Plan, Resource Allocation

3. Project Execution
Design and Modelling, Development and Documentation, Testing and Quality Assurance, UAT and Go Live

4. Maintainance
Maintainance and Support

Industries We Serve:

- Real Estate
- Healthcare
- eCommerce
- Social Networking
- Travel and Hospitality
- Media and Entertainment
- Education and eLearning
- Many more

abstrac: full LAMP, DevOps, and app development services.
bio:
I am an experienced developer that has more than 5+ years of experience integrating LAMP based web apps, Android apps, and low-level code (C/C++).

Some of my experience:
- LAMP (Using Linux, Apache, MySQL and PHP OR Python)
I have worked on LAMP based APIs, web apps, and RBDMS integrations. My work has included scalable and documented applications. I am very familiar with microservice based app development and traditional development practices, such as monoliths.
- Android and Mobile
I have more than 4+ years of experience in implementing and testing Android based apps. I have worked with Java 8 and Kotlin . And I have helped develop full mobile apps, tablet apps, and much more.
- AngularJS, JavaScript and MVC based components
I have experience integrating AngularJS and Angular 2+. I have used Angular as a framework for web and mobile based development. I have more than 4+ years of experience developing Angular SPAs, plugins, libraries, and more.
- Application Integration (DevOps)
Hands on experience integrating DevOps solutions such as CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes clusters, Docker containers, and more. I have helped create scalable build/release pipelines for complex solutions, and I have helped teams monitor, patch, and manage solutions at high scale.
Terms can be discussed. Safepay funding is usually recommended but also willing to work with up-front and remainder due on completion.
